title: Authors and Citation
text: Shah R (2023). shinyRatings: intuitive way providing star rating shiny app. R package version 0.0.1.
code: @Manual{,   title = {shinyRatings: An intuitive way of providing star rating on a shiny app},   author = {Ronak Shah},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.1}, }

what: An intuitive way of providing star rating on a shiny app
title: An intuitive way of providing star rating on a shiny app
text: ever needed way review things shiny ? Look , shinyRatings package built make process easy. also possible give 1/2 stars. Output
code: library(shiny) library(shinyRatings)  ui <- fluidPage(   shinyRatings('star'),    textOutput('text') )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   output$text <- renderText({paste("No. of stars : ", input$star)}) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

code: if(interactive()){  library(shiny)  library(shinyRatings)  ui <- fluidPage(   shinyRatings('star'),    textOutput('text') )  server <- function(input, output, session) {    output$text <- renderText({paste("No. of stars : ", input$star)}) }  shinyApp(ui, server) }
